name: Conway's Garden
description:
Become a custodian of nature in this interactive Conway's game of life walking simulator. Plant seeds and whisper words into the wind as you watch your forest bloom.

Made by Games For Crows
with royalty free music from Bensound
and tileset by Withering Systems

Join our discord server to chat about Conway's Garden, life, and all kinds of other games.

If you like what we do and would like to toss a few coins our way it'd make our day :)
